Benchmarks

Steffen Ehrmann

2020-01-05

Source: vignettes/benchmarks.Rmd
benchmarks.Rmd

Introduction

This script compares carries out benchmarks for diferent functions.

# packages for testing
library(bench)
library(testthat)
library(checkmate)
library(geometr)
library(raster)
## Loading required package: sp

Objects to test

First I create a couple of objects that will be tested.

largeRaster <- getData("worldclim", var = "tmin", res = 10)$tmin1
smallRaster <- gtRasters$categorical

largeGridGeom <- gc_geom(input = largeRaster)
smallGridGeom <- gtGeoms$grid$categorical

The objects have the following sizes

getSize <- function(x){
  temp <- object.size(x)
  print(temp, units = "KB")
}

getSize(x = largeRaster)
## 12.4 Kb
getSize(x = largeGridGeom)
## 7600.1 Kb
getSize(x = smallRaster)
## 29.9 Kb
getSize(x = smallGridGeom)
## 13.5 Kb

largeGridGeom is the largest file, as it is recently loaded into memory entirely. However, smallGridGeom is smaller than smallRaster, so probably largeGridGeom is also smaller than largeRaster, once that is loaded into memory for plotting.

geom vs raster

getters

mark(getCRS(x = largeGridGeom), getCRS(x = largeRaster), check = FALSE)

visualise

mark(visualise(smallGridGeom), visualise(smallRaster), check = FALSE, iterations = 10)
## # A tibble: 2 x 6
##   expression                    min   median `itr/sec` mem_alloc `gc/sec`
##   <bch:expr>               <bch:tm> <bch:tm>     <dbl> <bch:byt>    <dbl>
## 1 visualise(smallGridGeom)   95.9ms   99.1ms      9.30    2.69MB     1.03
## 2 visualise(smallRaster)     92.9ms   95.7ms     10.3   740.07KB     2.58
mark(visualise(smallRaster), plot(smallRaster), check = FALSE, iterations = 10)
## # A tibble: 2 x 6
##   expression                  min   median `itr/sec` mem_alloc `gc/sec`
##   <bch:expr>             <bch:tm> <bch:tm>     <dbl> <bch:byt>    <dbl>
## 1 visualise(smallRaster)   56.9ms     93ms      11.2     568KB     2.79
## 2 plot(smallRaster)        47.5ms   48.1ms      20.7     706KB     2.30
mark(visualise(largeGridGeom), visualise(largeRaster), check = FALSE, iterations = 10)
## # A tibble: 2 x 6
##   expression                    min   median `itr/sec` mem_alloc `gc/sec`
##   <bch:expr>               <bch:tm> <bch:tm>     <dbl> <bch:byt>    <dbl>
## 1 visualise(largeGridGeom)    420ms    637ms      1.71     173MB    3.59 
## 2 visualise(largeRaster)      733ms    758ms      1.33     252MB    0.133
mark(visualise(largeRaster), plot(largeRaster), check = FALSE, iterations = 10)
## # A tibble: 2 x 6
##   expression                  min   median `itr/sec` mem_alloc `gc/sec`
